subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In 35 games at Pittsburgh, Darrelle Revis recorded 129 tackles and 8 interceptions. Revis has missed 19 practices, 2 scrimmages, 1 walkthrough and 1 game.
snippet: In 35 games at Pittsburgh, Darrelle Revis recorded 129 tackles and 8 interceptions. Revis has missed 19 practices, 2 scrimmages, 1 walkthrough and 1 game.
